instructions: On your iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch, go to Settings > [ your name ] > iCloud > Photos. If you re asked to sign in, enter your Apple ID and password. If you don t have one, tap Create Apple ID, then follow the instructions. Select any of the following features to turn them on: iCloud Photos (previously called iCloud Photo Library ) Shared Albums (previously called iCloud Photo Sharing ) My Photo Stream (not available for new accounts)
